Content.Title: What Are the Benefits?
Content.BodyCopy:
Have a Rewarding Experience

92% of Speaking Partners said that they were likely to recommend this volunteer opportunity to a friend. Experience the joy others are feeling as they volunteer to help Pathway students improve their English.

Make New Friends

Many Speaking Partners have developed a deep love for those they are serving. Make a new friend by exchanging stories and talents.

Gain Spiritual Experiences as You Volunteer

96% of Speaking Partners reported that their experience was spiritual. We all need extra blessings and more opportunities to feel the Lord's spirit in our lives. Volunteer to see the Lord's hands in this inspired program.

Learn About the World and Different Cultures

Speak to members of the Church from all around the world including Albania, Ghana, Mexico, Peru, Russia, and the U.S. Volunteer to learn about different cultures where the Gospel is lived.

Serve Others

80% of Speaking Partners volunteered because they felt it was a great volunteer opportunity. Give the Lord a gift by serving your fellow brothers and sisters.

Help Others Improve Their English

96% of Pathway students reported that the program was effective in practicing their English. The program is working! Speaking Partners continue to help Pathway students, where English is their second language, succeed in their academic and English-speaking skills.

Fulfill a Course or Degree Requirement

If you need to fulfill service hours or are required to participate as a Speaking Partner for a course, you will be blessed to have the opportunity to serve Pathway students around the world.

Enrich Your Résumé

Improve your résumé with this volunteer opportunity. Develop skills like teaching, experience with various cultures, and intrapersonal communication.

Practice Teaching Others

Teaching is a skill that we all need, especially as members of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Use this opportunity to practice your teaching skills and patience with those learning English.

Reconnect with Those from the Country Where You Served Your Mission

Did you serve in parts of Albania, Ghana, Mexico, Peru, Russia, or the U.S.? Here is your chance to connect with members of the Church who are doing the BYU-Idaho Pathway Program in your mission area!
